import React, { useState } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import Link from 'next/link' import { Menu, Input, Row, Col } from 'antd' import styled from 'styled-components' import useSelector from 'redux' import LoginForm from '../components/LoginForm' import UserProfile from '../components/UserProfile' const SearchInput = styled(Input.Search)` vertical-align: middle; `; const AppLayout = ({ children }) => { const isLoggedIn = useSelector((state) => state.user.isLoggedIn) return (
슈퍼코더 프로필 회원가입 {isLoggedIn ? : } {children} 네이버
) } AppLayout.propTypes = { children: PropTypes.node.isRequired, }; export default AppLayout
